card.name: Desert Naturalist
card.text: When Desert Naturalist enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment, then search your library for a desert card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, deal X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of deserts you control.

card.name: Rock Hopper
card.text: Modified creatures you control have haste. Whenever a non-token creature you control enters the battlefield, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Rock with “Equipped creature has ‘1, {T}, Sacrifice Rock: This creature deals 2 damage to any target’” and equip {1} and attach it to it.
